LoginPage.title: Welcome Back
LoginPage.toastErrorDescription: Invalid username or password. Please try again.
LoginPage.toastSuccessDescription: Welcome! Redirecting you to the dashboard.
LoginPage.toastUnexpectedErrorDescription: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
LoginPage.toastOtpInvalidDescription: The one-time password you entered is incorrect.

hero.title: Solution EPI
hero.description: Your partner for workplace safety. Certified personal protective equipment that meets the strictest standards.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Solution Epi is a premium artisanal bakery founded on traditional baking methods and quality ingredients. Located in the heart of Douala, we pride ourselves on creating authentic breads and pastries that bring joy to our community.

cta.title: Ready to Experience Our Bakery?
cta.description: Visit our location in Douala or contact us to place a special order.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to build beautiful, data-driven admin interfaces.

modern.title: Modern UI
modern.description: Built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui for a sleek, responsive interface.

customizable.title: Fully Customizable
customizable.description: Easily extend and modify components to match your project's specific needs.

ai.title: AI-Powered Tools
ai.description: Integrated AI features that help automate tasks and increase productivity.

developer.title: Developer-Friendly
developer.description: Well-organized codebase with TypeScript for improved developer experience.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.subtitle: Follow these simple steps to start using Solution EPI.

step1.title: Set Up API
step1.description: Configure your Django REST Framework API endpoints.

step2.title: Customize UI
step2.description: Tailor the dashboard to match your requirements and brand.

step3.title: Deploy
step3.description: Deploy your application to your favorite hosting platform.

Header.signOutSuccessDescription: You have been successfully signed out.

DashboardPage.title: Dashboard
DashboardPage.description: Welcome back! Here's a summary of your project.
DashboardPage.loadErrorDescription: There was a problem loading dashboard data. Some information may be missing. Using mock data as a fallback.
DashboardPage.userSignupsCardDescription: A chart showing user sign-ups over the past few months.
DashboardPage.contentOverviewCardDescription: A summary of different content types.

feed.newPost: New blog post published: 'The Future of AI'
feed.newComment: New comment on 'Getting Started with Django'

ModelListPage.name: Name / Title
ModelListPage.deleteConfirm: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the item.

ModelListPage.exportPreparingDescription: Preparing to export {totalItems} items. This may take a moment.
ModelListPage.exportReadyDescription: Your {format} file is ready for download.
ModelListPage.loadModelConfigFailed: Failed to load configuration for model: {modelName}
ModelListPage.loadModelDataFailed: Failed to load data for model: {modelName}

ModelForm.saveSuccessDescription: The item has been successfully saved.

SettingsPage.title: Settings
SettingsPage.twoFactorDescription: Add an extra layer of security to your account.
SettingsPage.twoFactorEnabled: 2FA is currently enabled on your account.
SettingsPage.twoFactorDisabled: 2FA is currently disabled on your account.
SettingsPage.scanQrCode: Scan the QR code below with your authenticator app.
SettingsPage.secretKey: Or enter this secret key manually
SettingsPage.twoFactorEnableSuccessDescription: Two-factor authentication has been successfully enabled.

validation.newPasswordLength: New password must be at least 8 characters.
validation.otpLength: Your one-time password must be 6 characters.
validation.passwordRequiredFor2FA: Your password is required to disable 2FA.

AuthErrorPage.accessDeniedDescription: You do not have permission to access this page. Please contact an administrator if you believe this is an error.

AuthErrorPage.defaultDescription: An unknown authentication error has occurred. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
